scenes.description: MC section with various major announcements including a vinyl release and a new cover song.
End screen showing promotional information for Mori Calliope's vinyl and Blu-ray releases.

subtitles.original: 葬らされる全てが愛おしい
subtitles.english: Everything that's buried is so dear

subtitles.original: セピアの心情を
subtitles.english: These sepia-toned feelings

subtitles.original: 開いてはまた思い耽る
subtitles.english: Opening them up, I'm lost in thought again

subtitles.original: SAKURA Days
subtitles.english: SAKURA Days

subtitles.original: 遥か彼方響く君の声に耳を澄ませば
subtitles.english: If I listen closely to your voice echoing from afar

subtitles.original: 少なからずその温もり思い出せるように
subtitles.english: So that I can remember at least a little of that warmth

subtitles.original: 凛とした寂しさも風情と成る
subtitles.english: Even this dignified loneliness becomes part of the scenery

subtitles.original: SAKURA Days
subtitles.english: SAKURA Days

subtitles.english: SAKURA Days

subtitles.original: SAKURA Days
subtitles.english: SAKURA Days

subtitles.original: 少なからずその温もり思い出せるように
subtitles.english: So that I can remember at least a little of that warmth

subtitles.original: 麗しき SAKURA Days
subtitles.english: Beautiful SAKURA Days

subtitles.original: La la la la SAKURA Days
subtitles.english: La la la la SAKURA Days

subtitles.original: Woah SAKURA Days
subtitles.english: Woah SAKURA Days

subtitles.original: SAKURA Days
subtitles.english: SAKURA Days

subtitles.original: Thank you.
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: Everyone, thank you so much for coming to my karaoke party.
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you so much for coming to my karaoke party.

subtitles.original: I have one more announcement, two more announcements, but one really big one.
subtitles.english: I have one more announcement, two more announcements, but one really big one.

subtitles.original: One really big announcement, okay?
subtitles.english: One really big announcement, okay?

subtitles.original: Everybody...
subtitles.english: Everybody...

subtitles.original: It's my one-year anniversary with Universal Music as a major artist.
subtitles.english: It's my one-year anniversary with Universal Music as a major artist.

subtitles.original: やった！パチパチパチパチパチ！やったやったやった！
subtitles.english: Yatta! Clap clap clap clap clap! We did it, we did it!

subtitles.original: Yay!
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: So everyone, I would like to introduce to you...
subtitles.english: So everyone, I would like to introduce to you...

subtitles.original: SINDERELLA LP!
subtitles.english: SINDERELLA LP!

subtitles.original: That's right everybody, we've got a vinyl release coming out.
subtitles.english: That's right everybody, we've got a vinyl release coming out.

subtitles.original: That's right, and orders are gonna open up tonight!
subtitles.english: That's right, and orders are gonna open up tonight!

subtitles.original: So if you don't want to wait six months to get my merch,
subtitles.english: So if you don't want to wait six months to get my merch,

subtitles.original: you can go ahead and get this, or you can get both, that's good too.
subtitles.english: you can go ahead and get this, or you can get both, that's good too.

subtitles.original: But if you don't want to wait... Yay Mori Store, yay Mori Store!
subtitles.english: But if you don't want to wait... Yay Mori Store, yay Mori Store!

subtitles.original: You can add SINDERELLA to your vinyl collection.
subtitles.english: You can add SINDERELLA to your vinyl collection.

subtitles.original: Yay! More merch, more merch, more merch!
subtitles.english: Yay! More merch, more merch, more merch!

subtitles.original: Of course I wasn't gonna leave you guys without a vinyl, no no no.
subtitles.english: Of course I wasn't gonna leave you guys without a vinyl, no no no.

subtitles.original: I'm a big fan of records myself, so yatta!
subtitles.english: I'm a big fan of records myself, so we did it!

subtitles.original: It's out now. Oh, looks like it's out! Okay, it's out, you guys can get it.
subtitles.english: It's out now. Oh, looks like it's out! Okay, it's out, you guys can get it.

subtitles.original: Check the link in the description if you want to grab it.
subtitles.english: Check the link in the description if you want to grab it.

subtitles.original: The vinyl's out! You can go purchase it! Yatta!
subtitles.english: The vinyl's out! You can go purchase it! Yay!

subtitles.original: Yes, so you guys can check it out.
subtitles.english: Yes, so you guys can check it out.

subtitles.original: Yatta! I'm so happy, I'm so happy!
subtitles.english: Yay! I'm so happy, I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: I hope you guys get it. I can't wait to play it on my little phonograph,
subtitles.english: I hope you guys get it. I can't wait to play it on my little phonograph,

subtitles.original: my little turntable. I'm very excited, so I hope you guys will get it as well.
subtitles.english: my little turntable. I'm very excited, so I hope you guys will get it as well.

subtitles.original: LP, LP! Already bought? Oh my gosh, you guys are fast! Wow!
subtitles.english: LP, LP! Already bought? Oh my gosh, you guys are fast! Wow!

subtitles.original: You guys are really fast. はやーい！
subtitles.english: You guys are really fast. So fast!

subtitles.original: すごい、買ってくださいね、LPね。
subtitles.english: Amazing, please buy the LP, okay?

subtitles.original: そう、めちゃめちゃかっこいいこれ。
subtitles.english: Right, this is really, really cool.

subtitles.original: そうね。れいちゃん、あの素敵なアートね、ありますね、このジャケット。
subtitles.english: Right. Rei-chan, that lovely art is on this jacket.

subtitles.original: Yeah, it's also super limited in quantity, they are now telling me.
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's also super limited in quantity, they are now telling me.

subtitles.original: It's very limited, um, 'cause we can't make a million of these.
subtitles.english: It's very limited, um, 'cause we can't make a million of these.

subtitles.original: You guys know that there's, you know, kind of...
subtitles.english: You guys know that there's, you know, kind of...

subtitles.original: there's some... I don't know. You should get it now. You should get it now is what I'm trying to say.
subtitles.english: there's some... I don't know. You should get it now. You should get it now is what I'm trying to say.

subtitles.original: Is what I'm trying to say! I'm so happy, I'm so excited.
subtitles.english: Is what I'm trying to say! I'm so happy, I'm so excited.

subtitles.original: CHECK THE LINKS IN DESCRIPTION FOR MORE DETAILS!
subtitles.english: CHECK THE LINKS IN DESCRIPTION FOR MORE DETAILS!

subtitles.original: Um, so yeah, please grab it. Thank you so much everyone.
subtitles.english: Um, so yeah, please grab it. Thank you so much everyone.

subtitles.original: And I have one last thing to announce. I have a cover coming out.
subtitles.english: And I have one last thing to announce. I have a cover coming out.

subtitles.original: Um, I don't know exactly when, 'cause it's being checked.
subtitles.english: Um, I don't know exactly when, 'cause it's being checked.

subtitles.original: It should be within the next day or two days or so.
subtitles.english: It should be within the next day or two days or so.

subtitles.original: ちょっとサムネ見せてください。
subtitles.english: Please show the thumbnail for a bit.

subtitles.original: What song is it? What song is it? What song is...
subtitles.english: What song is it? What song is it? What song is...

subtitles.original: サラマンダー！
subtitles.english: Salamander!

subtitles.original: Salamander! So please, 楽しみにしててくださいね。
subtitles.english: Salamander! So please, look forward to it.

subtitles.original: Please look forward to it. I'm really, really proud of this one.
subtitles.english: Please look forward to it. I'm really, really proud of this one.

subtitles.original: It turned out super good, and I think you guys are gonna love it. So yay, please look forward.
subtitles.english: It turned out super good, and I think you guys are gonna love it. So yay, please look forward.

subtitles.original: And with that being said you guys, um, I'm your Mori.
subtitles.english: And with that being said you guys, um, I'm your Mori.

subtitles.original: I hope that you remember me. This was a really fun stream.
subtitles.english: I hope that you remember me. This was a really fun stream.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much you guys. Thanks for spending time with me, thanks for singing with me.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much you guys. Thanks for spending time with me, thanks for singing with me.

subtitles.original: And I guess I'll catch you guys on the flip side, okay?
subtitles.english: And I guess I'll catch you guys on the flip side, okay?

subtitles.original: Everybody take care. Be sure to grab the merch again, that would make me happy.
subtitles.english: Everybody take care. Be sure to grab the merch again, that would make me happy.

subtitles.original: And yeah, with that being said everyone, I'll see you later.
subtitles.english: And yeah, with that being said everyone, I'll see you later.

subtitles.original: Thank you for coming! Bye bye! ガイコツちゃんここに。
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming! Bye bye! Skeleton-chan, over here.

subtitles.original: Bye bye! See you everyone! またね！
subtitles.english: Bye bye! See you everyone! See you later!

subtitles.original: Peace out! Bye bye!
subtitles.english: Peace out! Bye bye!

subtitles.original: Mori Calliope SINDERELLA 2023.06.07 Vinyl Release!!
subtitles.english: Mori Calliope SINDERELLA 2023.06.07 Vinyl Release!!

subtitles.original: MAJOR DEBUT CONCERT NEW UNDERWORLD ORDER 2023.05.03 Blu-ray Release!
subtitles.english: MAJOR DEBUT CONCERT NEW UNDERWORLD ORDER 2023.05.03 Blu-ray Release!
